h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines
content: Before you meet the NPC that gives you the Gourd that allows you to absorb spirits, you’ll likely encounter some green wisps and maybe even side bosses that become spirits. Whether you have the Gourd or not, any spirits you don’t pick up can be collected at the Keeper’s Shrines so you don’t miss out on them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines'.
The content is as follows:
Before you meet the NPC that gives you the Gourd that allows you to absorb spirits, you’ll likely encounter some green wisps and maybe even side bosses that become spirits. Whether you have the Gourd or not, any spirits you don’t pick up can be collected at the Keeper’s Shrines so you don’t miss out on them.
